hero.title: UI Prompt Explorer
hero.subtitle: A playful collection of UI theme prompts for your next design

footer.description: UI Prompt Explorer - A playful collection of UI themes prompts

about.title: About UI Prompt Explorer
about.description: UI Prompt Explorer is a collection of hand-drawn style UI design concepts that can inspire your next project.
about.welcome: Welcome to the UI Prompt Explorer, a playful collection of hand-drawn user interface themes designed to inspire your next creative project.
about.purpose: Each theme in our gallery represents a unique visual style that can be adapted for websites, mobile apps, or digital products. Browse through our collection to find inspiration or use the provided prompts to generate similar designs.
about.project: This project was created as an exploration of creative design possibilities, showcasing how hand-drawn aesthetics can bring warmth and personality to digital interfaces.
about.clickTheme: Click on any theme for a preview
about.usePrompts: Use the prompts as inspiration for your designs
